Text:
Very interesting documentary, interviewing very credible witnesses, and presenting startling facts passed over, that would not have been passed over in a proper investigation and inquiry.
I wonder why the British establishment is so worried about this film. If it was just speculation they would surely ignore it, put they have not only not ignored it, but secretly attacking it's distribution.
I am going to make copies of this and distribute by hand, where it can be most effective.
